publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2282 Mr David Davidson:Eating Disorders Awareness Week—That the Parliament notes Eating Disorders Awareness Week from 6 to 12 February 2005; welcomes the Health Committee’s inquiry into eating disorder services in Scotland, taking evidence from sufferers, carers, support groups and health professionals in the field, and further asks that the Scottish Executive takes note of the evidence and proceeds to take action on any recommendations of the Health Committee.
S2M-2282 Eating Disorders Awareness Week (lodged on 20 January 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2282 Eating Disorders Awareness Week (lodged on 20 January 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-2282 Eating Disorders Awareness Week (lodged on 20 January 2005) John Swinburne*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2282 Eating Disorders Awareness Week (lodged on 20 January 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2282 Eating Disorders Awareness Week (lodged on 20 January 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-2282 Eating Disorders Awareness Week (lodged on 20 January 2005) Brian Adam*
